long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Try Eigemy's powerful Header Response Checker. Our Header Response Checker is an simple SEO tool for checking website header responses. 100 percent customisable user agents. Use whatever desktop, tablet, mobile device or robot that you like. Make up your own if you like!

Uniquely, this header response tool also allows you to simulate varying the Referring or Query URL of your choice the user agent. Hence you can simulate header responses from specific referral pages which can provide an insight into logic being used. 

This is a very handy for for working out of a site is use agent cloaking redirecting based on traffic source.

This Header Response Checker Tool is just one of many tools created by Eigemy, the Digital Growth Agency to help do a specific job on the fly. I you like it, we will upload more!
